Title: Relates to minority and women-owned business enterprise fraud and the monies of the minority and women-owned business enterprise fund
Summary: Relates to minority and women-owned business enterprise fraud and the monies of the minority and women-owned business enterprise fund; and to the effectiveness of certain provisions related thereto.
LawCode: Rpld §314-a, amd §§311 & 313, Exec L; amd §97-k, St Fin L; amd §6, Chap of 2022 (as proposed in S.3390-A & A.9259-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the state finance law, in relation to minority and women-owned business enterprise fraud and the monies of the minority and women-owned business enterprise fund; to amend a chapter of the laws of 2022 amending the executive law and the state finance law relating to minority and women-owned business enterprises post completion certification, duties of the director and creating the minority and women-owned business enterprise fund, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 3390-A and A. 9259-A, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; and to repeal certain provisions of the executive law relating thereto
